title: Deciphering genetic diversity phylogeny and assembly of Allium species through micro satellite markers on nuclear DNA
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Talamarla Yeswanth Mahidar Gowd, Chandra Deo, Dalasanuru Chandregowda Manjunathagowda, Vijay Mahajan, Ram Dutta, Nangsol Dolma Bhutia, Barun Singh, Vadde Mounika
